overview: Away on a horse riding course during one week, Marion, Sophie, Emma and their friends are going to use the outing to the countryside to have sex with all the good-looking boys in the local area. You will quickly see that their sexual appetite has no limit!  As you will quickly enjoy discovering, just like all her classmates, Marion thinks about nothing else but sex! She has arranged to meet up for a picnic with the baker's son, but the young brunette has other ideas! He soon finds out what she has in mind when she takes his big dick in her mouth. This leads to a wild sex session that gives Marion multiple orgasms.  A few days later, you will come across Marion again as she is given a wild double penetration fuck by two men from the stables. And to finish this babe will takes two servings of cum in her mouth...
tagline: Get ready: these six stunning riders in school uniform are going to give you a really hard time!
title: Young Horse Riders
